How many people are affected by neurohypophyseal diabetes insipidus ?,"Neurohypophyseal diabetes insipidus is thought to be rare, although its exact incidence is unknown. The acquired form occurs much more frequently than the familial form.",GHR,neurohypophyseal diabetes insipidus
